abstract: Clearwire, the wireless Internet provider that attracted billions of dollars of investment last May from big names like Google, Time Warner Cable, Intel and Comcast, is causing its investors some major heartburn.
lead_paragraph: Clearwire, the wireless Internet provider that attracted billions of dollars of investment last May from big names like Google, Time Warner Cable, Intel and Comcast, is causing its investors some major heartburn.

headline.main: Clearwire Proves Costly for Its Big Investors
